english.segment1: Something's very wrong here. Your heart has frozen over. And something's very strange here. You've lost all desire
english.segment2: The comfort we create to prove we're something. But we're starving. Screaming in the night cause you want answers. From the one. And there is hope again
english.segment3: Don't give up you're not thinking. Don't give up just keep seeking (Oh yeah). And I, I am for you. And I, I will love you. And I, I am for you. And I, I will save you
english.segment4: Come and take my face or forever I will walk alone. And all the same mistakes. Cause I know you, I deny you. Days go by and choices still remain forever. Right and wrong is black and white. The illusions of this world. And there is hope again
english.segment5: Don't give up, you're not thinking. Don't give up, just keep seeking (Oh yeah). And I, I am for you. And I, I will love you. And I, I am for you. And I, I will save you
english.segment6: I send my self to you. Yes always and always. I send my love to you[x2]
english.segment7: . And I, I am for you. And I, I will love you. And I, I am for you. And I, I will save you
english.segment8: You found today, found today, you found today, with your life today
